attributes.action: stop imagrate getting housing and benefits
attributes.additional_details: Iv seen to many people that ain't British taking advantage of are benefits and housing they advertise the fact they do it to take the pee out of are country yet the government do nothing I think this is wrong and something needs to be done for the sake of the next generation of British people. I think any one who enters are country should be told straight there is no benefits for them and no social housing why should the tax payer pay for people who would do nothing for use if we went to there country
